events.message: I received my order yesterday but the item does not match the description. I want to request a refund as soon as possible.
Assigned cluster Refund because customer mentions requesting a refund due to item mismatch.
Support agent Mike has been assigned to handle the refund request for this customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm sorry to hear about your issue. Could you please provide your order number to proceed with the refund process?
Could you also please upload a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue before processing your refund?
Here is my order number 548392 and I attached a picture showing that the color is completely different from what was advertised.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund immediately and send you a prepaid label to return the incorrect item at no cost.
Thank you for your quick reply and handling this matter swiftly. I appreciate the refund offer and return label.
The refund process has been completed, and you should receive the amount back to your original payment method within 5-7 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since the refund was successfully processed and confirmed received, we will now close this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
